message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this deal and we both walk away happy.
I think we can both do better. Let's split it more evenly this time.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is still generous, but I won't wait forever. Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains!
Let's just split it down the middle.  Inflation is hurting both of us, and this is the fairest solution.
